name: Shiverion
description: A majestic dragon of eternal winter. Its crystalline wings can create blizzards that freeze entire battlefields. Ancient legends speak of its power to bring ice ages.

ability.name: Frozen Majesty
ability.description: Ice-type moves have 30% increased power and 20% chance to freeze. Dragon-type moves gain 25% critical hit rate.

moves.name: Dragon Pulse
moves.description: The target is attacked with a shock wave generated by the user's gaping mouth.

moves.name: Blizzard
moves.description: A howling blizzard that may freeze the target and all nearby enemies.

moves.name: Ice Shard
moves.description: Hurls chunks of ice with priority. Always goes first.

moves.name: Glacial Storm
moves.description: Ultimate ice attack that hits all enemies and may cause freeze and frostbite.

habitat: Frozen mountain peaks and arctic caverns
